content: {"name": "Grace & Mercy Food Pantry Church of Christ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "If you have any emergency needs you can call us between 8AM to 4PM, Monday through Friday to make special arrangements.\n\nPeople start lining up around 12pm . ", "email": "", "url": "https://gracemercyfoodpantry.org/#about", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "301 38th Street North", "address_2": null, "city": "St. Petersburg", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33713", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.7748973, "longitude": -82.6845841}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 486-1768", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
